description: This joke plays on the double meaning of 'up-snowing', as both a literal rise in snow and an increase in work responsibilities.
title: Upsnowing Challenge
n_1: Eddie arrives at work with a ladder during a snowstorm.
n_2: Boss Bryan looks puzzled as snow falls heavily.
c1_2: I thought we're getting more work piled up... like snow!
c1_3: Guess I took it too literally!
n_4: They both chuckle as Eddie sets aside the ladder.
